scripts.build: cd shared && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm run build"
scripts.build:deployment: cd shared && npm run build && cd .. && cd frontend && npm run build:deployment && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.start:all: (cd frontend && npm run start) & (cd backend && npm run start)
scripts.install:all: npm i && concurrently "cd shared && npm i" "cd frontend && npm i" "cd backend && npm i"
scripts.setup: npm i && cd shared && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently "cd frontend && npm i" "cd backend && npm i"
scripts.prune: npm prune && cd shared && npm prune && cd ../frontend && npm prune && cd ../backend && npm prune
scripts.prune:deployment: npm prune --production && cd shared && npm prune --production && cd ../backend && npm prune --production
scripts.deployment: npm run setup:ci && npm run build:deployment && npm run prune:deployment
scripts.setup:ci: npm ci && cd shared && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm ci && cd ../backend && npm ci
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd shared && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd shared && npm run lint:fix" "cd frontend && npm run lint:fix" "cd backend && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.test:concurrently: concurrently "cd shared && npm run test" "cd frontend && npm run test" "cd backend && npm run test"
scripts.test: cd shared && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test && cd ../backend && npm run test
scripts.merge-coverage: mkdir coverage && cp backend/coverage/coverage-final.json coverage/backend.json && cp frontend/coverage/coverage-final.json coverage/frontend.json && cp shared/coverage/coverage-final.json coverage/shared.json && nyc merge coverage coverage/merged/coverage.json && nyc report -t coverage/merged --report-dir coverage/reports --reporter=html --reporter=cobertura --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary
